http://sci.scientific-direct.net/c.asp?839990&41248fb1d7ff79fc&33 
 
A new issue of Wiley Interdisciplinary Reviews Computational Statistics 
http://sci.scientific-direct.net/c.asp?839990&41248fb1d7ff79fc&34 
is now available. 
 
WIREs Computational Statistics is: 
* An important new forum to promote cross-disciplinary discussion 
on a broad array of computational and statistical techniques 
* An authoritative and encyclopedic resource addressing key topics 
from the diverse perspective of traditional statistics and modern computation 
* Filled with content that is fully citable, qualifying for abstracting, indexing, 
and ISI ranking 
 
 
Included in : Volume 2, Issue 2 
http://sci.scientific-direct.net/c.asp?839990&41248fb1d7ff79fc&35
